                        Class<? extends org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter<?>> aClass)

        Specified by:
        supports in interface org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseBodyAdvice<Object>

      • beforeBodyWrite

        public Object beforeBodyWrite(Object o,
                              org.springframework.core.MethodParameter methodParameter,
                              org.springframework.http.MediaType mediaType,
                              Class<? extends org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter<?>> aClass,
                              org.springframework.http.server.ServerHttpRequest serverHttpRequest,
                              org.springframework.http.server.ServerHttpResponse serverHttpResponse)
        Invoked after an HttpMessageConverter is selected and just before its write method is invoked.
        Specified by:
        beforeBodyWrite in interface org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseBodyAdvice<Object>
        Parameters:
        o - the body to be written methodParameter the return type of the controller method mediaType the content type selected through content negotiation aClass the converter type selected to write to the response serverHttpRequest the current request serverHttpResponse the current response
        Returns:
        the body that was passed in or a modified (possibly new) instance
